item.title: Switzerland honors victims of deadly Alpine bar fire in national day of mourning
item.description: Switzerland will hold a memorial service to honor the 40 people who were killed in an Alpine bar fire earlier this month during a New Year’s celebrati...

item.title: 2 shot by federal agent in 'targeted' stop, Portland mayor asks ICE halt operations
item.description: Two people were injured in a shooting involving a federal agent in Portland, Oregon, on Thursday, authorities said.

item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting live updates: Officer identified through court records
item.description: Tensions are flaring in Minneapolis after an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer fatally shot a 37-year-old woman on Wednesday.

item.title: WATCH: NASA returning crew from ISS, cuts space mission short after medical issue
item.description: In an unprecedented move, NASA will bring four astronauts – including two Americans – home early from their mission at the International Space Station...
